document_data.name: Armorers of the Wonderbringer
document_data.mainbody: The '''Armorers of the Wonderbringer''' was an honorary order whose members were devoted to [[Gond]], the Wonderbringer.<ref name="FaA-p63" >
document_data.Organization: Members of this organization were skilled armorers who praised the Lord of All Smith by making and repairing [[armor]].
